includedAssets.title: The Doctor, The Widow And The Wardrobe
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep1 - The Doctor, The Widow And The Wardrobe
includedAssets.synopsis: Evacuated to a house in Dorset from war-torn London, Madge Arwell and her two children, Lily and Cyril, are greeted by a madcap caretaker whose mysterious Christmas gift leads them into a magical wintry world.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Evacuated to Dorset, a family are greeted by a madcap caretaker who leads them into a magical wintry world.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Evacuated to a house in Dorset from war-torn London, Madge Arwell and her two children, Lily and Cyril, are greeted by a madcap caretaker whose mysterious Christmas gift leads them into a magical wintry world.

includedAssets.title: Asylum Of The Daleks
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep2 - Asylum Of The Daleks
includedAssets.synopsis: Kidnapped by his oldest foe, the Doctor is forced on an impossible mission - to a place even the Daleks are too terrified to enter.... the Asylum. A planetary prison confining the most terrifying and insane of their kind, the Doctor and the Ponds must find an escape route. But with Amy and Rory's relationship in meltdown, and an army of mad Daleks closing in, it is up to the Doctor to save their lives, as well as the Pond's marriage.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When the Doctor is kidnapped by his oldest foe, he is forced on an impossible mission.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kidnapped by his oldest foe, the Doctor is forced on an impossible mission - to a place even the Daleks are too terrified to enter.... the Asylum. A planetary prison confining the most terrifying and insane of their kind, the Doctor and the Ponds must find an escape route. But with Amy and Rory's relationship in meltdown, and an army of mad Daleks closing in, it is up to the Doctor to save their lives, as well as the Pond's marriage.

includedAssets.title: Dinosaurs On A Spaceship
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep3 - Dinosaurs On A Spaceship
includedAssets.synopsis: An unmanned spaceship hurtles towards certain destruction - unless the Doctor can save it, and its impossible cargo... of dinosaurs. By his side a ragtag gang of adventurers: a big game hunter, an Egyptian queen and a surprised member of the Pond family. But little does the Doctor know, there is someone else on board who will stop at nothing to keep hold of his precious, prehistoric cargo.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor battles to save an unmanned spaceship and its impossible cargo of dinosaurs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An unmanned spaceship hurtles towards certain destruction - unless the Doctor can save it, and its impossible cargo... of dinosaurs. By his side a ragtag gang of adventurers: a big game hunter, an Egyptian queen and a surprised member of the Pond family. But little does the Doctor know, there is someone else on board who will stop at nothing to keep hold of his precious, prehistoric cargo.

includedAssets.title: A Town Called Mercy
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep4 - A Town Called Mercy
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor gets a Stetson (and a gun!), and finds himself the reluctant Sheriff of a Western town under siege by a relentless cyborg, who goes by the name of the Gunslinger. But who is he and what does he want? The answer seems to lie with the mysterious Kahler-Jex, an alien doctor (yes another one!) whose initial appearance is hiding a dark secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor finds himself a reluctant marshal in a Western town hiding a secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor gets a Stetson (and a gun!), and finds himself the reluctant Sheriff of a Western town under siege by a relentless cyborg, who goes by the name of the Gunslinger. But who is he and what does he want? The answer seems to lie with the mysterious Kahler-Jex, an alien doctor (yes another one!) whose initial appearance is hiding a dark secret.

includedAssets.title: The Power Of Three
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep5 - The Power Of Three
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor and the Ponds puzzle an unlikely invasion of Earth, as millions of sinister black cubes arrive overnight, almost like presents falling from the sky. But what are they, what's inside them and most importantly, who sent them? With the international community at a loss, it's left to the Doctor to unearth who is behind the mystery.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor and the Ponds puzzle an unlikely invasion of Earth, as millions of sinister black cubes arrive overnight.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor and the Ponds puzzle an unlikely invasion of Earth, as millions of sinister black cubes arrive overnight, almost like presents falling from the sky. But what are they, what's inside them and most importantly, who sent them? With the international community at a loss, it's left to the Doctor to unearth who is behind the mystery.

includedAssets.title: The Angels Take Manhattan
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep6 - The Angels Take Manhattan
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor's heart-breaking farewell to Amy and Rory - a race against time through the streets of Manhattan as New York's statues come to life around them... With Rory's life in danger, the Doctor and Amy must locate him before it's too late! Luckily, an old friend helps them and guides the way...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor, Amy and Rory race through the streets of Manhattan as New York's statues come to life around them.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor's heart-breaking farewell to Amy and Rory - a race against time through the streets of Manhattan as New York's statues come to life around them... With Rory's life in danger, the Doctor and Amy must locate him before it's too late! Luckily, an old friend helps them and guides the way...

includedAssets.title: The Snowmen
includedAssets.synopsis: Christmas Eve, 1892, and the falling snow is the stuff of fairy tales. When the fairy tale becomes a nightmare and a chilling menace threatens Earth, an unorthodox young governess, Clara, calls on the Doctor for help. But the Doctor is in mourning, reclusive and determined not to engage in the problems of the universe. As old friends return, will the Doctor really abandon humankind, or will he fight to save the world and Christmas from the icy clutches of this mysterious menace?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor and new companion Clara face the sinister Doctor Simeon and an army of snowmen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Christmas Eve, 1892, and the falling snow is the stuff of fairy tales. When the fairy tale becomes a nightmare and a chilling menace threatens Earth, an unorthodox young governess, Clara, calls on the Doctor for help. But the Doctor is in mourning, reclusive and determined not to engage in the problems of the universe. As old friends return, will the Doctor really abandon humankind, or will he fight to save the world and Christmas from the icy clutches of this mysterious menace?

includedAssets.title: The Bells Of Saint John
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep8 - The Bells Of Saint John
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor's search for Clara Oswald brings him to modern day London, where Wi-Fi is everywhere. But something dangerous is lurking in the signals, picking off minds and imprisoning them. As Clara becomes the target of this insidious menace, the Doctor races to save her and the world from an ancient enemy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor's search for Clara Oswald brings him to modern day London where something dangerous is lurking in the Wi-Fi.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor's search for Clara Oswald brings him to modern day London, where Wi-Fi is everywhere. But something dangerous is lurking in the signals, picking off minds and imprisoning them. As Clara becomes the target of this insidious menace, the Doctor races to save her and the world from an ancient enemy.

includedAssets.title: The Rings Of Akhaten
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep9 - The Rings Of Akhaten
includedAssets.synopsis: Clara wants to see something awesome, so the Doctor whisks her off to the inhabited rings of the planet Akhaten, where the Festival of Offerings is in full swing. Clara meets the young Queen of Years as the pilgrims and natives ready for the ceremony. But something is stirring in the pyramid, and a sacrifice will be demanded.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor takes Clara to the Festival of Offerings, but the Old God demands a sacrifice!
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clara wants to see something awesome, so the Doctor whisks her off to the inhabited rings of the planet Akhaten, where the Festival of Offerings is in full swing. Clara meets the young Queen of Years as the pilgrims and natives ready for the ceremony. But something is stirring in the pyramid, and a sacrifice will be demanded.

includedAssets.title: Cold War
includedAssets.synopsis: The Doctor and Clara land on a damaged Russian Submarine in 1983 as it spirals out of control into the ocean depths. An alien creature is loose on board, having escaped from a block of Arctic ice. With tempers flaring and a cargo of nuclear weapons on board, it's not just the crew but the whole of humanity at stake!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On a Russian submarine in 1983, a frozen alien warrior is waking up...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor and Clara land on a damaged Russian Submarine in 1983 as it spirals out of control into the ocean depths. An alien creature is loose on board, having escaped from a block of Arctic ice. With tempers flaring and a cargo of nuclear weapons on board, it's not just the crew but the whole of humanity at stake!
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes

includedAssets.title: Hide
includedAssets.synopsis: Clara and the Doctor arrive at Caliburn House, a haunted mansion sat alone on a desolate moor. Within its walls, a ghost hunting Professor and a gifted psychic are searching for the Witch of the Well. Her apparition appears throughout the history of the building, but is she really a ghost? And what is chasing her?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Something haunts Caliburn House and the Doctor finds himself part of the ghost hunt.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clara and the Doctor arrive at Caliburn House, a haunted mansion sat alone on a desolate moor. Within its walls, a ghost hunting Professor and a gifted psychic are searching for the Witch of the Well. Her apparition appears throughout the history of the building, but is she really a ghost? And what is chasing her?

includedAssets.title: Journey To The Centre Of The Tardis
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep12 - Journey To The Centre Of The Tardis
includedAssets.synopsis: A spaceship salvage team drags the TARDIS on board, sending its systems into meltdown. As the Doctor marshals the motely salvage crew outside, he realises Clara is still trapped within his malfunctioning ship, pursued by a dangerous group of ossified monsters. He has just 30 minutes to find Clara and save his TARDIS before it self-destructs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The TARDIS has crashed, Clara is lost inside, and the Doctor has 30 minutes to save her.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A spaceship salvage team drags the TARDIS on board, sending its systems into meltdown. As the Doctor marshals the motely salvage crew outside, he realises Clara is still trapped within his malfunctioning ship, pursued by a dangerous group of ossified monsters. He has just 30 minutes to find Clara and save his TARDIS before it self-destructs.

includedAssets.title: The Crimson Horror
includedAssets.synopsis: There's something very odd about Mrs Gillyflower's Sweetville mill, with its perfectly clean streets and beautiful people. There's something even stranger about the bodies washing up in the river, all bright red and waxy. When the Doctor and Clara go missing, it's up to Vastra, Jenny and Strax to rescue them before they too fall victim to the Crimson Horror!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In Victorian Yorkshire, the Doctor finds bodies with their skin waxy and glowing red.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There's something very odd about Mrs Gillyflower's Sweetville mill, with its perfectly clean streets and beautiful people. There's something even stranger about the bodies washing up in the river, all bright red and waxy. When the Doctor and Clara go missing, it's up to Vastra, Jenny and Strax to rescue them before they too fall victim to the Crimson Horror!
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: Nightmare In Silver
includedAssets.synopsis: Hedgewick's World of Wonders was once the greatest theme park in the galaxy, but it's now the dilapidated home to a shabby showman, a chess playing dwarf and a dysfunctional army platoon. When the Doctor, Clara, Artie and Angie arrive, the last thing they expect is the re-emergence of one of the Doctor's oldest foes. The Cybermen are back!
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hedgewick's World of Wonders theme park is ground zero for a Cybermen resurrection.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Hedgewick's World of Wonders was once the greatest theme park in the galaxy, but it's now the dilapidated home to a shabby showman, a chess playing dwarf and a dysfunctional army platoon. When the Doctor, Clara, Artie and Angie arrive, the last thing they expect is the re-emergence of one of the Doctor's oldest foes. The Cybermen are back!

includedAssets.title: The Name Of The Doctor
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep15 - The Name Of The Doctor
includedAssets.synopsis: Clara is summoned to an impossible conference call, alerting her that the deadly Whisper Men are closing in on Vastra, Jenny and Strax. Someone is kidnapping the Doctor's friends, leading him toward the one place in all of time and space that he should never go. It's a deadly trap that threatens to unravel his past, present and future.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Doctor has a secret he intends to take to his grave, but all is about to be revealed.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clara is summoned to an impossible conference call, alerting her that the deadly Whisper Men are closing in on Vastra, Jenny and Strax. Someone is kidnapping the Doctor's friends, leading him toward the one place in all of time and space that he should never go. It's a deadly trap that threatens to unravel his past, present and future.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt Smith returns for his third series as the Eleventh Doctor and teams up with the Ponds to help save a spaceship full of dinosaurs, don Stetsons in the Wild West, take on his oldest foe and battle the Weeping Angels in Manhattan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt Smith returns as the Doctor to save a ship full of dinosaurs, don Stetsons in the Wild West and battle the Weeping Angels in Manhattan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt Smith returns for his third series as the Eleventh Doctor and teams up with the Ponds to help save a spaceship full of dinosaurs, don Stetsons in the Wild West, take on his oldest foe and battle the Weeping Angels in Manhattan.

includedIn.title: Doctor Who
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The Doctor, an enigmatic Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey, travels through time and space on missions of discovery and adventure.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The Doctor, an enigmatic Time Lord from the planet Gallifrey, travels through time and space on missions of discovery and adventure.

synopsis: Matt Smith returns for his third series as the Eleventh Doctor and teams up with the Ponds to help save a spaceship full of dinosaurs, don Stetsons in the Wild West, take on his oldest foe and battle the Weeping Angels in Manhattan.
